title: Mazda’s Mysterious New Four-Door Could Mark the Return of the Mazda 6
description: With Toyota rolling out a host of oddities for the 2025 Japan Mobility Show, Mazda has announced its own set. descriptionSummary: Mazda is heading to the 2025 Japan Mobility Show with a lineup that distills the essence of human connection through driving experiences, staying true to its heritage by emphasizing the emotional bond between drivers and their vehicles.

description: Mercedes-Benz has just unveiled its new Vision Iconic show car, flaunting a futuristic design that also honors the brand’s past. Key features include photovoltaic paint harnessing solar power, advanced autonomous driving capabilities, and cutting-edge artificial intelligence inspired by human brain function.

title: 3 Ways Hyundai’s EVs Helped Fuel a Record-Breaking Q3
description: Hyundai Motor America has achieved a record-breaking Q3 this year, thanks to the success of fully electric models like the Ioniq 5, impressive sales from hybrids such as the Elantra and Santa Fe, and strong dealership engagement. title: These Limited-Edition BMWs Pay Homage to Some Local Legends
description: One of the coolest things about cars is that some models transcend their metal to become cultural icons. descriptionSummary: In the world of cars, some vehicles transcend their steel and wheels to become deeply ingrained in popular culture. Two South African icons from the early 1990s are being honored with an ultra-exclusive tribute that's both nostalgic and cutting-edge.

title: Tesla Model Y Gets New Marine Blue Color — US Left Out
description: Tesla has once again found a way to update its lineup without changing much. But this time, instead of adding a new trim level like the Model Y Standard, the company has introduced a brand-new Marine Blue paint option for the Model Y built at Giga Berlin. descriptionSummary: Tesla's latest update adds a fresh twist to its lineup without significant changes. The company has introduced a new Marine Blue paint finish on the Model Y produced at Giga Berlin, leaving some US customers with a color conundrum.

title: Genesis Opens New California Design Studio to Shape Future Luxury Models
description: Genesis has officially opened a new 80,000-square-foot design studio in El Segundo, California, solidifying its position as a truly global luxury automaker. Called Genesis Design California, the studio will serve as the brand’s western creative hub alongside design centers in Seoul ...

title: GM Ends Hydrogen Fuel Cell Development to Refocus on EVs
description: General Motors has confirmed it will end development of its next-generation hydrogen fuel cell systems, marking a major strategic shift away from hydrogen-powered vehicles. The company said it will redirect resources toward battery-electric technologies, citing higher market demand and the ...
titleSummary: "General Motors Abandons FCH Efforts, Shifts Focus Entirely to Electric Vehicle Technology"
descriptionSummary: General Motors is scrapping plans for its next-gen hydrogen fuel cell technology, opting instead to focus on battery-electric innovations that better align with market trends and consumer preferences. Resources are being realigned as a result.

title: Honda Launches Killer 2026 CR-V Lease Offers For October
description: If the Toyota RAV4 didn’t exist, the Honda CR-V would be the top-selling compact crossover in the United States. It’s not the cheapest or flashiest, but the CR-V’s reliability reputation, efficient powertrains, and spacious cabin combine to make it one of the most sensible purchases in the segment. ...

descriptionSummary: The Honda CR-V's understated appeal makes it a top contender in the compact crossover market, where its solid reputation for reliability, thrifty engines, and generous interior space have earned it a loyal following among practical buyers.

title: New Genesis GV70 Arriving In Two Distinct Hybrid Flavors
description: Genesis isn’t resting on its laurels, quietly being a top dog in the luxury space, and is doubling down on electrification with two new versions of the GV70: a Hybrid (HEV) and an Extended-Range Electric Vehicle (EREV). Recent spy shots from South Korea and Southern Spain show prototypes wearing an ...

descriptionSummary: Luxury brand Genesis is accelerating its electric push, unveiling two new versions of the GV70: a hybrid model and a long-range EV. Spy shots reveal prototypes testing in both Korea and Spain.

title: Gen X Just Made the Fox Body Mustang Cool Again
description: If you’re from the Gen X era, you probably have a Fox Body Mustang memory. Whether you owned one, knew someone who had one, or got smoked by one at a stoplight, the 1979 through 1993 Mustang defined affordable performance for a long time. descriptionSummary: For many Gen Xers, the Fox Body Mustang is an ingrained part of their automotive nostalgia. Affordable and accessible, these '79 to '93 models made high-performance driving possible for everyday enthusiasts without breaking the bank.

descriptionSummary: Mercedes-Benz is reviving its rich design heritage with a retro-inspired twist on the all-electric C-Class, as hinted at in recent teasers from Chief Design Officer Gorden Wagener's Instagram feed.

title: A Dog Triggered a Volvo’s Tailgate Sensor — Then It Allegedly Hit the Owner
description: Volvo is facing a lawsuit in New Jersey alleging that one of its motion-activated tailgate systems malfunctioned and caused serious injury. title: You’re Subsidizing New Car Sales Every Time You Pay for Repairs
description: Two identical Trump tariffs landed this spring: 25% on imported new cars and the same 25% on imported parts. descriptionSummary: The revamped Hyundai Palisade made its debut this year, boasting a sophisticated and upscale aesthetic, alongside a cutting-edge hybrid engine option that elevates its capabilities and appeal. We took it for a spin with high expectations.

titleSummary: "Kia's Hidden Problem Solved by Resourceful EV6 Driver's Sharp Eye"

title: Lucid Sales Are on the Rise. But Is It Fast Enough?

It’s a sign that Lucid’s long-awaited production ramp is finally gaining traction — though ...

This milestone suggests the company's production efforts are finally hitting their stride.

description: A staple of the Honda lineup for years, the CR-V compact crossover has just turned 30. Yes, this RAV4 rival was officially introduced in Japan three decades ago, when the first generation went on sale there. Since then, the CR-V has become Honda’s best-selling individual model in several markets, ...

descriptionSummary: The Honda CR-V celebrates a major milestone: 30 years of compact crossover excellence. Introduced in Japan three decades ago as the first-generation model, it's since become a top seller worldwide and a key player in Honda's global lineup.

descriptionSummary: Mercedes-Benz has outlined a strategy to reduce carbon emissions in its components, but its efforts are complicated by its CEO's opposition to an impending EU ban on internal combustion engines.

title: Porsche Learns From VW And Commits To Buttons
description: For Porsche, certain physical controls in the company's interiors are now taboo. These won't be removed, say company executives, after the brand initially did so in its Taycan EV. The Taycan made more extensive use of haptics and touch controls than previous Porsche models, and eschewed the brand's ...
titleSummary: "Buttoning Up: Porsche Takes Cue from Volkswagen's Design Revamp"
descriptionSummary: Porsche is shifting away from traditional physical controls in its interiors, opting instead for haptic feedback and touchscreen interfaces. This approach, first seen in the Taycan EV, is here to stay according to company executives.

A June "New Chapter" announcement hinted at a major reveal, but it ended up being something entirely different – a nod to the automaker's sailing partnership.

titleSummary: Rarest of Rare: 1962 Ferrari 250 GTO Set for Auction in Florida this Spring

This prized model was crafted by Ferrari to meet the FIA's Group 3 regulations, showcasing its exceptional design and prowess on the track.

descriptionSummary: Ferrari is doubling down on its heritage while embracing change, with internal combustion engines set to remain at the heart of its offerings alongside rapidly advancing hybrid and electric technologies.

description: Find out how BMW's Debrecen plant uses AI tech and renewables to revolutionize EV manufacturing.

descriptionSummary: Discover the innovative approach behind BMW's Debrecen facility, where cutting-edge artificial intelligence and sustainable energy solutions are transforming the production of electric vehicles into a high-tech, eco-friendly process.

title: Finally, a Restomod Builder Brave Enough to Ignore the Porsche 911
description: The Porsche 904 Carrera GTS stands as one of Stuttgart's most significant racing machines. With only 106 examples built between 1963 and 1964, this mid-engined marvel won several races, including first and second at the 1964 Targa Florio. Meanwhile, the Porsche 914 occupies the opposite end of the ...
titleSummary: "Taking on the Unholy Trinity: A Rebel's Approach to Restored Supercars"
descriptionSummary: In the Porsche stable, few cars embody racing excellence like the 904 Carrera GTS. Built in limited numbers between '63 and '64, it proved a winning machine, claiming top spots at the 1964 Targa Florio among other victories. In contrast, its more laid-back counterpart, the 914, represents another iconic chapter in Porsche's storied history.

title: Keep things simple with this 1994 Ford Ranger XL
description: As the song says, sometimes you don't know what you've got 'til it's gone. The current midsize Ford Ranger is an appealing pickup truck in its own right, but its size and emphasis on creature comforts makes it easier appreciate the last compact Rangers from the 1990s and early 2000s, which largely ...
titleSummary: "Rugged Simplicity Revived: 1994 Ford Ranger XL Hits the Mark"
descriptionSummary: We often take things for granted until they're no longer with us. The modern Ford Ranger is a capable pickup, but its larger dimensions make us nostalgic for the smaller, more rugged compact Rangers that preceded it.
